original_text: Masters, provide your slaves with what is right and fair, because you know that you also have a Master in heaven.
korean_text: 상전들아 의와 공평을 종들에게 베풀지니 너희에게도 하늘에 상전이 계심을 알지어다

sentences.original_text: provide your slaves with what is right and fair,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 종들에게 정당하고 공정한 것을 제공하라

sentences.original_text: that you also have a Master in heaven.
